comments:
I open a Java editor in Eclipse and get flooded with error dialogs.

BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -nolocking
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86 -nolocking
